description: Best practices and templates for software development prompts

bestPractices.rule: Specify the programming language and version
bestPractices.why: Local models produce better code when the language and version constraints are explicit
Without explicit instruction, models often omit try/except blocks and edge cases
Few-shot examples dramatically improve output accuracy for code generation

bestPractices.rule: State the testing framework if tests are expected
bestPractices.why: Models default to unittest; specifying pytest or another framework avoids rewrites
Prevents the model from importing unavailable or unwanted third-party packages

templates.name: Function Generation
templates.context: You are a {{language}} expert. The codebase uses {{framework}} and targets {{python_version}}.

templates.name: Code Review
templates.context: You are a senior {{language}} developer performing a code review.
templates.objective: Review the following code for bugs, performance issues, and style violations.
